document.full_text: all-star guard ray allen, a vital cog in the boston celtics' success, has exercised his option to remain with the team next season, the celtics said on tuesday.
document.title: allen agrees to stay with celtics another year
lines_and_colors: all-star guard ray allen, a vital cog in the boston celtics' success, has exercised his option to remain with the team next season, the celtics said on tuesday.
